DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct determine 5 mg amlodipine 3rd Orally-Disintegrating ( OD ) tablet ( new formulation ) 5 mg amlodipine 2nd OD tablet ( commercial formulation ) bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study For 5 Mg Amlodipine Orally-Disintegrating Tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 28 kg/m2 ; total body weight within range 50 100 kg History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 10 cigarette per day
